ValidationRule.description: Validates Email field if unique. Must not be the same with Staff Email, Student Email, or Work Email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT (ISBLANK(Email) ), OR( IF(Email = QUT_Staff_Email__c, true, false) , IF(Email = QUT_Learner_Email__c, true, false) , IF(Email = Work_Email__c, true, false) ) )
